languages.text: Спутникам Вольного Торговца часто есть что сказать по поводу происходящего. Найти членов свиты можно на мостике пустотного корабля.
The Rogue Trader's companions frequently have something to say about unfolding events. Find members of the Lord Captain's retinue on the voidship's bridge.
languages.original_text: Спутникам Вольного Торговца часто есть что сказать по поводу происходящего. Найти членов свиты можно на мостике пустотного корабля.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader's companions frequently have something to say about unfolding events. Find members of the Lord Captain's retinue on the voidship's bridge.

The Rogue Trader's companions frequently have something to say about unfolding events. Find members of the Lord Captain's retinue on the voidship's bridge.

languages.text: Les compagnons du libre-marchand ont fréquemment des choses à dire sur les événements en cours. Les membres de la suite du seigneur-capitaine se trouvent généralement sur la passerelle du vaisseau spatial.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's companions frequently have something to say about unfolding events. Find members of the Lord Captain's retinue on the voidship's bridge.

traits.locale_text: Les compagnons du libre-marchand ont fréquemment des choses à dire sur les événements en cours. Les membres de la suite du seigneur-capitaine se trouvent généralement sur la passerelle du vaisseau spatial.

languages.text: Los compañeros de tu Comerciante Independiente suelen tener algo que decir sobre el curso de los acontecimientos. Podrás encontrar a los miembros de tu séquito en el puente de tu nave.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's companions frequently have something to say about unfolding events. Find members of the Lord Captain's retinue on the voidship's bridge.

traits.locale_text: Los compañeros de tu Comerciante Independiente suelen tener algo que decir sobre el curso de los acontecimientos. Podrás encontrar a los miembros de tu séquito en el puente de tu nave.

languages.text: 自由開拓者の仲間は、現在起きている出来事についてしばしば何らかの言及をすることがある。ヴォイドシップのブリッジでロード・キャプテンの仲間を探してみよう。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's companions frequently have something to say about unfolding events. Find members of the Lord Captain's retinue on the voidship's bridge.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の仲間は、現在起きている出来事についてしばしば何らかの言及をすることがある。ヴォイドシップのブリッジでロード・キャプテンの仲間を探してみよう。

languages.text: 行商浪人的同伴经常会对当前发生的事情发表看法，您可以在虚空舰的舰桥上找到您的随从。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's companions frequently have something to say about unfolding events. Find members of the Lord Captain's retinue on the voidship's bridge.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的同伴经常会对当前发生的事情发表看法，您可以在虚空舰的舰桥上找到您的随从。

languages.text: Die Gefährten {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} haben häufig etwas zu aktuellen Ereignissen zu sagen. Finde auf der Brücke des Raumschiffs Mitglieder der Entourage {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's companions frequently have something to say about unfolding events. Find members of the Lord Captain's retinue on the voidship's bridge.

traits.locale_text: Die Gefährten {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} haben häufig etwas zu aktuellen Ereignissen zu sagen. Finde auf der Brücke des Raumschiffs Mitglieder der Entourage {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in yoldaşlarının gelişmekte olan olaylara dair sık sık söyleyecek şeyleri olur. Lord Kaptan'ın maiyetindekileri uçsuz gemisinin köprüsünde bulabilirsin.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's companions frequently have something to say about unfolding events. Find members of the Lord Captain's retinue on the voidship's bridge.
